Image Skyline1 = | Image of Skyline = }} Onitsha ( or just Ọ̀nị̀chà) is a city on the east side of the Nigeria River, in Nigeria's Anambra State. It has a river port. In 2006, around 260,000 people lived there. It was also the largest city in Biafra. ==References== Category:Cities in Nigeria Category:1550 establishments Category:Anambra State
title: Onitsha
